name: 林子喬
objective:
Discuss the principles and features of kinds of electric machines, including (1) Physical Fundamentals of Newton's Law, Faraday's Law, Rotational Motion, and Power; (2) Concepts of Magnetic Field; (3) Electrical-Mechanical Energy Conversion; (4) Winding and Air-gap Magnetomotive Force; (5) Winding Inductance and Voltage Equation; (6) Linear DC Machine; (7) Transformers; (8) DC Motors; (9) DC Generators.

探討各種電機工作原理及特性，內容包含：(1) 牛頓定理、法拉第定理、旋轉運動，與功率等物理基礎 (2) 磁路觀念；(3) 電機 - 機械能量轉換；(4) 繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (5) 繞組電感及電壓方程式；(6) 線性直流電機；(7) 變壓器；(8) 直流電動機；(9) 直流發電機
schedule:
W1: Course Introduction and Rules (課程簡介及上課規則)
W2~W4: Overview of Electromagnetic Conversion Theories (電磁能量轉換)
W5~W7: Transformers (變壓器)
W8: Transformers & Course Review  (變壓器及課程複習)
W9: Midterm Exam (期中考)
W10: Midterm Commentary & Fundamental of DC Machines Theories (期中考檢討及直流機基礎原理)
W11: Fundamental of DC Machines Theories (直流機基礎原理)
W12~W14: Theories of DC Motors (直流電動機工作原理)
W15~W16: Theories of DC Generators (直流發電機工作原理)
W17: Theories of DC Generators & Course Review (直流發電機工作原理及課程複習)
W18: Final Exam (期末考)
scorePolicy: (一). Attendance, Discussion and Homework (平時)：50% ; (二). Midterm (期中)：25% ; (三). Final (期末)：25%
materials:
(一)．Text book ：Stephen J. Chapman, PH PTR , 5th edition (Feb. 18, 2011), 東華書局代理.
(二)．Reference book：A. E. Fitzgerald, Electric Machinery, McGraw-Hill , 6th edition (July 25, 2002).
